channel.title: Vera Farmiga on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Vera Farmiga on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life, Now Targeting Colossal $75M-Plus Opening
item.description: New Line’s horror pic is blowing up at the box office in a much-needed boost for theater owners. The rerelease of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly.

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life, Now Targeting Colossal $75M-Plus Opening
item.description: New Line’s horror pic is blowing up at the box office in a much-needed boost for theater owners. The rerelease of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly.

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life, Now Targeting Record $65M-Plus Opening
item.description: The horror pic is blowing up at the Friday box office after earning a franchise-best $8.5 million in Thursday previews. The re-release of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly.

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Jolts Box Office Back to Life, Now Targeting Record $65M-Plus Opening
item.description: The horror pic is blowing up at the Friday box office after earning a franchise-best $8.5 million in Thursday previews. The re-release of Lin-Manuel Miranda’s ‘Hamilton’ is also singing loudly.

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Review: Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson Return for a Concluding Chapter Full of Stale Scares
item.description: The Warrens wrap up their role in ‘The Conjuring’ universe with this latest entry in the hit horror franchise.

item.title: ‘The Conjuring: Last Rites’ Review: Vera Farmiga and Patrick Wilson Return for a Concluding Chapter Full of Stale Scares
item.description: The Warrens wrap up their role in ‘The Conjuring’ universe with this latest entry in the hit horror franchise.

item.title: The Warrens Face Their First Demon and Annabelle Doll Returns in ‘Conjuring: Last Rites’ Final Trailer
item.description: Ed and Lorraine Warren take on the “case that ended it all” in the fourth and final ‘Conjuring’ film, which releases in theaters Sept. 5.
